item.title: Kubestronaut 02 CKA
item.author: Author
item.description: 11/30 註：寫需求分析不可控的因素太多了，除了要兼顧 bigger picture、detailed process、granular fields for programming、還要顧慮到 user sentiment、senior critics、 … 就現階段而言，工作有關給人最多成就感的是拿到證照這條路（來人拿球棒敲醒這個人吧），其它都像是練習，不停製造錯誤再不停被導回正途 ![image-20241129110027476](/Users/yiwen/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20241129110027476.png) Topics not on CKAD but on CKA Workloads/Services DaemonSets Scheduling/Deploying Manual Scheduling kube-scheduler Multiple Schedulers Static pods Storage Hostpath volume Storage Class (creating) Security Certificate API Obervability Managing Application Logs Cluster Setup and Maintenance Cluster install (need to know it but it’s never tested) Cluster upgrade etcd architecture, backup and restore kube-proxy CoreDNS Trouble shooting
